trans-unit.source: Provides data for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref> event that occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> moves.

Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"></xref> enumeration value and the new location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"></xref> enumeration value that describes the type of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> movement that caused the event.
The value that corresponds to the new location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.

Performs the appropriate type casting to call the type-safe <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventHandler"></xref> delegate for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref> event.
The current object along the event's route.
Gets a value that represents the new location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.

The new value corresponds to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is implemented for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
The value that corresponds to the new position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.

Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"></xref> enumeration value that describes the change in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> position that caused this event.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"></xref> enumeration value that describes the type of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> movement that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref> event.
